VALIDATION - Static variable in class com.orchestranetworks.service.ServiceKey
Built-in service for validating a data space, snapshot, or a data set: the user is directed to the validation report of the selected entity.

VIEW_COMPLETED_WORKFLOW - Static variable in class com.orchestranetworks.workflow.ProcessExecutionContext.WorkflowPermission

VOID_KEY - Static variable in class com.onwbp.adaptation.PrimaryKey
PrimaryKey with an empty string as its internal representation.
ValidationReport - interface com.orchestranetworks.service.ValidationReport.
A validation report is composed of validation items each one is characterized by a severity and has a user message.
ValidationReportItem - interface com.orchestranetworks.service.ValidationReportItem.
Represents an element of a validation report.
ValidationReportItemIterator - interface com.orchestranetworks.service.ValidationReportItemIterator.
Iterator over items held by a validation report.
ValidationReportItemSubject - interface com.orchestranetworks.service.ValidationReportItemSubject.
Represents the subject of a validation report item.
ValidationReportItemSubjectForAdaptation - interface com.orchestranetworks.service.ValidationReportItemSubjectForAdaptation.
Represents the subject of a validation report item in the context of a data set or record.
ValidationReportItemSubjectForTable - interface com.orchestranetworks.service.ValidationReportItemSubjectForTable.
Represents the subject of a validation report item in the context of a table.
ValueAccessException - exception com.orchestranetworks.instance.ValueAccessException.
Thrown to indicate when an access to a value is not possible because of some inconsistencies in the data.
ValueChange - interface com.orchestranetworks.schema.trigger.ValueChange.
Represents a change of a terminal node value.
ValueChanges - interface com.orchestranetworks.schema.trigger.ValueChanges.
Represents changes applied on a record.
ValueContext - interface com.orchestranetworks.instance.ValueContext.
Common interface for accessing the content and context of a data set or record.
ValueContextForInputValidation - interface com.orchestranetworks.instance.ValueContextForInputValidation.
This container interface enhances the validation interface with the possibility to set values that will be automatically validated against the underlying data model.
ValueContextForUpdate - interface com.orchestranetworks.service.ValueContextForUpdate.
This container interface provides the possibility of setting values on persisted or transient content whose structure and types conform to an underlying data model.
ValueContextForValidation - interface com.orchestranetworks.instance.ValueContextForValidation.
This container interface provides services for performing validations on nodes containing values.
ValueContextForValidationOnRecord - interface com.orchestranetworks.instance.ValueContextForValidationOnRecord.
This interface represents a validation context on a record in the scope of a constraint on table performing checks at record-level.
ValueContextForValidationOnTable - interface com.orchestranetworks.instance.ValueContextForValidationOnTable.
This interface provides the services for accessing the content of a table and for adding validation messages in the context of a validation process.
ValueFunction - interface com.orchestranetworks.schema.ValueFunction.
Computes a value when this value is not persisted by EBX5.
ValueFunctionContext - interface com.orchestranetworks.schema.ValueFunctionContext.
Provides methods for setting up a value function in the context of its data model.
VersionKey - class com.orchestranetworks.instance.VersionKey.
Identifies a snapshot in a repository.
validate(ValueContextForValidation) - Method in class com.orchestranetworks.scheduler.ScheduledTask
Validates the current task configuration.
validateInput(UIRequestContext) - Method in class com.orchestranetworks.ui.UIBeanEditor
This method offers the opportunity to perform specific validation on user input.
validateInputList(UIRequestContext) - Method in class com.orchestranetworks.ui.UIBeanEditor
This method does the same thing as validateInput for an aggregated list.
